#summary The Second F2F meeting of the Advanced/Hybrid Layouts WG (London, April 2013)

= Introduction =

The Advanced/Hybrid Layouts WG will have its second face to face meeting in London after the Book Fair :
  * Dates: 18th and 19th of April 2013
  * Meeting Location: meeting will be hosted by Hachette UK.

= Location =
Hachette Livre UK has secured two different venues for the two day meeting.

*Day One, 18th April*

Boardroom, Octopus Publishing Group, 7th floor, Endeavour House, 189 Shaftesbury Avenue, London WC2H 8JY
Google Map Location

*Day Two, 19th April*

Boardroom, Little Brown Book Group, 100 Victoria Embankment, London EC4Y 0DY
Google Map Location

Please Makoto and Matthieu as co-chairs, coulf you contact Suzy van den Berg [suzy.vandenberg@hachette.co.uk] directly. She will put the organiser of the meeting in touch with the two companies directly to discuss the logistics.
